law.text: Every deed of release shall be executed as deeds are executed and shall be as effectual for the purposes therein expressed, without the execution of a lease, as if a lease had been executed.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 492, 498.
